
# RFC Drafting â€” Prompt File

Use when drafting an RFC.

RFC format:
- Title
- Problem statement (why change)
- Options considered (at least 2)
- Quantified evaluation (time/complexity/risk/maintainability/dependencies)
- Proposed change
- Migration plan (stepwise)
- Verification / regression plan
- Rollback plan
- Decision required (yes/no + any parameters)
